title: What is this?
review: What a waste of time. This is an amateurish movie with no plot, sense or script. The whole movie is in a room playing a stupid game. The ending confirm how stupid is this. Avoid it. Go for a walk instead or look for another one.

title: Great lead actors. Tense psychological film
review:
This wasn't what I was expecting at all, I was pleasantly surprised. I expected a saw type torture porn film but it is more psychological, tense.
Yes it has a couple of toe curling scenes but it's never gratuitous.
The two leads are remarkable and the tension rises. Kept me gripped until the very satisfying end. Which is rare for me.
A simple one room set, two actors (mostly) and I recommend you all give it a watch.
Far better than most.

title: "Odds" are you won't finish this movie
review: Torture with no real message and the special effects are pretty cheep. I did like the lead girl and James Fuertes is always a pleasure to look at.
